statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 23 \\ 29 \\ 3 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -33 \\ -43 \\ -1 \\ -10 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
